title: Did Nikki Haley acknowledge "a coincidence " at an exhibition with Donald Trump?
subtitle: United States Ambassador Nikki Hailey is inadvertently "acknowledged" only because she is emotionally involved with President Trump in the headlines, not in her own words.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: United States Ambassador to the United Nations (Niki Haley) "accidently admitted" that she was emotionally involved with President Trump.
